verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> unto Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <WH3405> [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צַו֮ <WH6680> Command אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וְנָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> that they give לַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> unto the Levites מִֽנַּחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> of the inheritance אֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <WH272> of their possession עָרִ֣ים <WH5892> cities לָשָׁ֑בֶת <WH3427> to dwell in וּמִגְרָ֗שׁ <WH4054> suburbs לֶֽעָרִים֙ <WH5892> for the cities סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5439> round about תִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> and ye shall give לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> [also] unto the Levites

וְהָי֧וּ <WH1961> become הֶֽעָרִ֛ים <WH5892> And the cities לָהֶ֖ם לָשָׁ֑בֶת <WH3427> shall they have to dwell in וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <WH4054> and the suburbs יִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> shall be for לִבְהֶמְתָּם֙ <WH929> of them shall be for their cattle וְלִרְכֻשָׁ֔ם <WH7399> and for their goods וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and for all חַיָּתָֽם׃ <WH2416> and for all their beasts

וּמִגְרְשֵׁי֙ <WH4054> And the suburbs הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> of the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> unto the Levites מִקִּ֤יר <WH7023> [shall reach] from the wall הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city וָח֔וּצָה <WH2351> and outward אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> a thousand אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וּמַדֹּתֶ֞ם <WH4058> And ye shall measure מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> from without לָעִ֗יר <WH5892> the city אֶת־ <WH853> פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side קֵ֣דְמָה <WH6924> on the east אַלְפַּ֪יִם <WH505> two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֟ה <WH520> cubits וְאֶת־ <WH853> פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side נֶגֶב֩ <WH5045> and on the south אַלְפַּ֨יִם <WH505> two thousand בָּאַמָּ֜ה <WH520> cubits וְאֶת־ <WH853> פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָ֣ם ׀ <WH3220> and on the west אַלְפַּ֣יִם <WH505> two thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> פְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side צָפ֛וֹן <WH6828> and on the north אַלְפַּ֥יִם <WH505> two thousand בָּאַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits וְהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> and the city בַּתָּ֑וֶךְ <WH8432> [shall be] in the midst זֶ֚ה <WH2088> This יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall become לָהֶ֔ם מִגְרְשֵׁ֖י <WH4054> this shall be to them the suburbs הֶעָרִֽים׃ <WH5892> of the cities

וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> And among the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> unto the Levites אֵ֚ת <WH853> שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> [there shall be] six עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <WH4733> for refuge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּתְּנ֔וּ <WH5414> which ye shall appoint לָנֻ֥ס <WH5127> that he may flee שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> for הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <WH7523> for the manslayer וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> addition תִּתְּנ֔וּ <WH5414> thither and to them ye shall add אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> and two עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> cities

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> [So] all the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> which ye shall give לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> to the Levites אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> [shall be] forty וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <WH8083> and eight עִ֑יר <WH5892> cities אֶתְהֶ֖ן <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <WH4054> them [shall ye give] with their suburbs

וְהֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> And the cities אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> which ye shall give מֵאֲחֻזַּ֣ת <WH272> [shall be] of the possession בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֵ֤ת <WH853> הָרַב֙ <WH7227> from [them that have] many תַּרְבּ֔וּ <WH7235> ye shall give many וּמֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> הַמְעַ֖ט <WH4592> but from [them that have] few תַּמְעִ֑יטוּ <WH4591> ye shall give few אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> every one כְּפִ֤י <WH6310> according נַחֲלָתוֹ֙ <WH5159> to his inheritance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִנְחָ֔לוּ <WH5157> which he inheriteth יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> shall give מֵעָרָ֖יו <WH5892> of his cities לַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> unto the Levites פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to כִּ֥י <WH3588> When אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> unto them When ye be come over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וְהִקְרִיתֶ֤ם <WH7136> Then ye shall appoint לָכֶם֙ עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> you cities עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> to be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> of refuge תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֑ם וְנָ֥ס <WH5127> may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> there רֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> for you that the slayer מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> thither which killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <WH7684> at unawares

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become לָכֶ֧ם הֶעָרִ֛ים <WH5892> And they shall be unto you cities לְמִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> for refuge מִגֹּאֵ֑ל <WH1350> from the avenger וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> will not יָמוּת֙ <WH4191> die הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> that the manslayer עַד־ <WH5704> until עָמְד֛וֹ <WH5975> not until he stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> in judgment

וְהֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> And of these cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּתֵּ֑נוּ <WH5414> which ye shall give שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities מִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> shall ye have for refuge תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <WH1961> become לָכֶֽם׃

אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three הֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> cities תִּתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> Ye shall give מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> on this side לַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> and three הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> cities תִּתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> shall ye give בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> [which] shall be cities מִקְלָ֖ט <WH4733> of refuge תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ <WH1961> become

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> [both] for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֤ר <WH1616> and for the stranger וְלַתּוֹשָׁב֙ <WH8453> and for the sojourner בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <WH8432> among תִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <WH1961> become שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> These six הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These לְמִקְלָ֑ט <WH4733> shall be a refuge לָנ֣וּס <WH5127> may flee שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there כָּל־ <WH3605> anyone מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> them that every one that killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> any person בִּשְׁגָגָֽה׃ <WH7684> unawares

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בִּכְלִ֨י <WH3627> him with an instrument בַרְזֶ֧ל ׀ <WH1270> of iron הִכָּ֛הוּ <WH5221> And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <WH4191> so that he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> he מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> the murderer

וְאִ֡ם <WH518> If בְּאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> a stone יָד֩ <WH3027> him with throwing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָמ֨וּת <WH4191> wherewith he may die בָּ֥הּ הִכָּ֛הוּ <WH5221> And if he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <WH4191> and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> he מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> the murderer

א֡וֹ <WH176> Or בִּכְלִ֣י <WH3627> weapon עֵֽץ־ <WH6086> of wood יָד֩ <WH3027> him with an hand אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָמ֨וּת <WH4191> wherewith he may die בּ֥וֹ הִכָּ֛הוּ <WH5221> Or [if] he smite וַיָּמֹ֖ת <WH4191> and he die רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> he מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall surely יוּמַ֖ת <WH4191> be put to death הָרֹצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> the murderer

גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> The revenger הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> of blood ה֥וּא <WH1931> him he יָמִ֖ית <WH4191> himself shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <WH7523> the murderer בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <WH6293> when he meeteth ב֖וֹ ה֥וּא <WH1931> himself יְמִיתֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH4191> shall slay

וְאִם־ <WH518> If בְּשִׂנְאָ֖ה <WH8135> him of hatred יֶהְדָּפֶ֑נּוּ <WH1920> But if he thrust אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> or hurl עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and בִּצְדִיָּ֖ה <WH6660> at him by laying of wait וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> that he die

א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְאֵיבָ֞ה <WH342> Or in enmity הִכָּ֤הוּ <WH5221> smite בְיָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> him with his hand וַיָּמֹ֔ת <WH4191> that he die מֽוֹת־ <WH4191> [him] shall surely יוּמַ֥ת <WH4191> be put to death הַמַּכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> he that smote רֹצֵ֣חַֽ <WH7523> [for] he [is] a murderer ה֑וּא <WH1931> he גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> the revenger הַדָּ֗ם <WH1818> of blood יָמִ֛ית <WH4191> shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <WH7523> the murderer בְּפִגְעוֹ־ <WH6293> when he meeteth בֽוֹ׃

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בְּפֶ֥תַע <WH6621> him suddenly בְּלֹא־ <WH3808> without אֵיבָ֖ה <WH342> enmity הֲדָפ֑וֹ <WH1920> But if he thrust אוֹ־ <WH176> or הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> or have cast עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> any כְּלִ֖י <WH3627> upon him any thing בְּלֹ֥א <WH3808> without צְדִיָּֽה׃ <WH6660> without laying of wait

א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְכָל־ <WH3605> any אֶ֜בֶן <WH68> Or with any stone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> him יָמ֥וּת <WH4191> wherewith a man may die בָּהּ֙ בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> [him] not רְא֔וֹת <WH7200> seeing וַיַּפֵּ֥ל <WH5307> and cast עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> on וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> [it] upon him that he die וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לֹא־ <WH3808> nor אוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> and [was] not his enemy ל֔וֹ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> neither sought רָעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH7451> his harm

וְשָֽׁפְטוּ֙ <WH8199> shall judge הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> Then the congregation בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between הַמַּכֶּ֔ה <WH5221> between the slayer וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> and the revenger הַדָּ֑ם <WH1818> of blood עַ֥ל <WH5921> according הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> according to these judgments הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> to these

וְהִצִּ֨ילוּ <WH5337> shall deliver הָעֵדָ֜ה <WH5712> And the congregation אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹצֵ֗חַ <WH7523> the slayer מִיַּד֮ <WH3027> out of the hand גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> of the revenger הַדָּם֒ <WH1818> of blood וְהֵשִׁ֤יבוּ <WH7725> shall restore אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> and the congregation אֶל־ <WH413> to עִ֥יר <WH5892> him to the city מִקְלָט֖וֹ <WH4733> of his refuge אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to which נָ֣ס <WH5127> whither he was fled שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> and he וְיָ֣שַׁב <WH3427> and he shall abide בָּ֗הּ עַד־ <WH5704> until מוֹת֙ <WH4194> in it unto the death הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּדֹ֔ל <WH1419> of the high אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who מָשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> which was anointed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּשֶׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> oil הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> with the holy

וְאִם־ <WH518> if יָצֹ֥א <WH3318> shall at any time יֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> come הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <WH7523> But if the slayer אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> without the border עִ֣יר <WH5892> of the city מִקְלָט֔וֹ <WH4733> of his refuge אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> to which יָנ֖וּס <WH5127> whither he was fled שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it

וּמָצָ֤א <WH4672> find אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> And the revenger הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> of blood מִח֕וּץ <WH2351> him without לִגְב֖וּל <WH1366> the borders עִ֣יר <WH5892> of the city מִקְלָט֑וֹ <WH4733> of his refuge וְרָצַ֞ח <WH7523> kill גֹּאֵ֤ל <WH1350> and the revenger הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> of blood אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣רֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> the slayer אֵ֥ין <WH369> else ל֖וֹ דָּֽם׃ <WH1818> he shall not be guilty of blood

כִּ֣י <WH3588> because בְעִ֤יר <WH5892> in the city מִקְלָטוֹ֙ <WH4733> of his refuge יֵשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> Because he should have remained עַד־ <WH5704> until מ֖וֹת <WH4194> until the death הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּדֹ֑ל <WH1419> of the high וְאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> but after מוֹת֙ <WH4194> the death הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּדֹ֔ל <WH1419> of the high יָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> shall return הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> the slayer אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH272> of his possession

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become אֵ֧לֶּה <WH428> These לָכֶ֛ם לְחֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> So these [things] shall be for a statute מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> of judgment לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1755> unto you throughout your generations בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4186> in all your dwellings

כָּל־ <WH3605> anyone מַ֨כֵּה־ <WH5221> Whoso killeth נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> any person לְפִ֣י <WH6310> by the mouth עֵדִ֔ים <WH5707> of witnesses יִרְצַ֖ח <WH7523> the murderer אֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹצֵ֑חַ <WH7523> shall be put to death וְעֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> but one לֹא־ <WH3808> no יַעֲנֶ֥ה <WH6030> shall not testify בְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> against any person לָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> [to cause him] to die

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִקְח֥וּ <WH3947> Moreover ye shall take כֹ֙פֶר֙ <WH3724> no satisfaction לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> for the life רֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> of a murderer אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who ה֥וּא <WH1931> he רָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> which [is] guilty לָמ֑וּת <WH4191> of death כִּי־ <WH3588> for מ֖וֹת <WH4191> but he shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> put to death

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִקְח֣וּ <WH3947> And ye shall take כֹ֔פֶר <WH3724> no satisfaction לָנ֖וּס <WH5127> for him that is fled אֶל־ <WH413> to his עִ֣יר <WH5892> to the city מִקְלָט֑וֹ <WH4733> of his refuge לָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> that he should come again לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> to dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land עַד־ <WH5704> before מ֖וֹת <WH4194> until the death הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> of the priest

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and no תַחֲנִ֣יפוּ <WH2610> So ye shall not pollute אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you בָּ֔הּ כִּ֣י <WH3588> are for הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> wherein ye [are] for blood ה֥וּא <WH1931> he יַחֲנִ֖יף <WH2610> it defileth אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְלָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> and the land לֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no יְכֻפַּ֗ר <WH3722> cannot be cleansed לַדָּם֙ <WH1818> of the blood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שֻׁפַּךְ־ <WH8210> that is shed בָּ֔הּ כִּי־ <WH3588> for אִ֖ם <WH518> by בְּדַ֥ם <WH1818> therein but by the blood שֹׁפְכֽוֹ׃ <WH8210> of him that shed

וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> shall not תְטַמֵּ֣א <WH2930> Defile אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> not therefore the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> which ye shall inhabit בָּ֔הּ אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of which אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I שֹׁכֵ֣ן <WH7931> I dwell בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ <WH8432> wherein כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for I the LORD שֹׁכֵ֕ן <WH7931> dwell בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ
